name: A Distant Connection
description: Expose the harsh truths about long distance relationships whether it be friendships or romantic relationships as well as mental health issues in young adults.  Every person will always have to sacrifice something or someone in their life and there will always be an unhappy aspect in both sides. Distance plays a big role in how people connect and I wanted to explore how you don’t need to talk or see somebody everyday to maintain a relationship with them. But there will be downfalls and disconnects you can’t always avoid.
